pages.text: “Nombe ŵanganyammwe nganim'ba mun'galagatile (Allah) jwangun'galagatila (kutendaga n'di mu ukafili pemo).”
“Nombe une soni nganimba nachigalagatile cham'bele n'di nkuchigalagatila ŵanganyammwe.”
“Nombe ŵanganyammwe nganim'ba mun'galagatile (Allah) jwangun'galagatila (kutendaga n'di mu ukafili pemo).”
“Jenumanja nkwete dini jenu (jagalagatila isanamu) une none ngwete dini jangu (jakun’galagatila Allah).”
Ndema jachiyiche chikulupusyo cha Allah ni kuwugula (Maaka kuŵa m’makono mwa Asilamu)
Ni kwaona mmwejo ŵandu ali nkwinjila mu dini ja Allah mikutula-mikutula
Basi (jele ndemajo) luswejesyani lumbili lwa Ambuje ŵenu, ni kwaŵenda chikululuko. Chisimu Ŵalakweo aŵele Ŵakupochela nnope toba
Gajonasiche makono ganagaŵili ga Abu Lahabi, nombe nao ajonasiche
Ngaija kwakamuchisya ipanje yao atamuno yaŵapanganyisye (mpela ŵanache ŵaŵaŵeleche)
Niŵankwao ŵakwe ŵaŵaliji nkutwichila sasu (syamiŵa nikuntejelaga Muhammadi ﷺ mwakupita)
Nnukosi mwao (ŵele ŵakongweo) chimukaŵe mwana litondolo lyamiŵamiŵa (lyakwalagachisya nalyo)
